name: Fast Food In10sifies
description:
Submission for Ludum Dare Jam #51. Theme: Every 10 seconds

Content: You are working in a hip burger store. The special thing about this burger store is, that every burger order is highly customizable but also delivered within a few seconds. So you need to be tough to keep up with all the orders.

Controls: Mouse

Idea, programming and graphics: dunkelgrau
Sound: CC0 from opengameart.org
Music: Danya Vodovoz
